name: Shootdodgetankcatchavoidman
description:
5 games in one and see how big the winning streak you can make!

Controls 

arrow keys or wasd for movement 

 n, m or space keys for actions

5 mini games randomly picked

  1. Avoid - Don't get hit by the Spike balls
  2. Catch - Catch all the baseballs
  3. Tanks - Shoot the computer before it shoots you
  4. Dodge - Jump over monsters with drills
  5. Shoot - Shoot all the balloons

Made by Kid Yeti & Ben Sidwell (aka Baby Schmidt)

Music and Sound Effects by Ben Sidwell.

Thank you to all the people who made these palettes
